CustomField.description: If the Principal elects to gross settle, the Principal agrees to pay the Fees no later than 14 days by electronic funds transfer, or 21 days by direct debit from the date of issue of the tax invoice or adjustment note in the amounts set out therein.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Principal elects to gross settle, the Principal agrees to pay the Fees no later than 14 days by electronic funds transfer, or 21 days by direct debit from the date of issue of the tax invoice or adjustment note in the amounts set out therein.
CustomField.label: Gross Settlement Fee
